text: @SenSchumer Love that you are staying “on message” about 45s lack of strategy. IMHO might be more powerful worded: “it’s been 106 days since the 1st Covid19 death, 96,329 dead and Trump still doesn’t have...” most people know the date, not everyone is tracking deaths
